name: The Mapmakers
description:
1v1 exploration game where you create a map and discover small worlds!

------------
TUTORIAL:

In PHASE 1 you have 3 minutes to draw a map (access map with SPACE) & explore a small world. Take note of landmarks, golden compasses and biomes.


During PHASE 2, depending on how detailled and accurate your map is, you'll be able to find more or less landmarks than your opponent!
------------

WATCH our Game Dev VIDEOS here: https://www.youtube.com/c/Blackthornprod/videos
